initBlock.name: Gregorian Calendar - Trailing 12 Periods
initBlock.description: Defaults to the last 12 periods + current period
tags: Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot

selectStatements.query:
SELECT
    'TRAILING_12_GREGORIAN_PERIODS',B.CAL_MONTH_CODE
FROM
    ( SELECT 
        CAL_MONTH_ID, CURRENT_CAL_MONTH_CODE ,
        (COUNT(1) OVER (ORDER BY CAL_MONTH_ID)
        ) AS RUN_COUNT 
      FROM
        DW_MONTH_D 
    )A,
    ( SELECT 
        CAL_MONTH_ID, CAL_MONTH_CODE ,
        (COUNT(1) OVER (ORDER BY CAL_MONTH_ID)
        ) AS RUN_COUNT 
      FROM
        DW_MONTH_D 
    )B 
WHERE
    A.CURRENT_CAL_MONTH_CODE = 'Current'
AND B.RUN_COUNT BETWEEN A.RUN_COUNT-12 AND A.RUN_COUNT
